item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m a JavaScript, Python, and Rust Software Developer, Web Performance Champion, and Front-End Ops / Front-End Infrastructure engineer. I tinker with wacky experiments in AI/ML, stuff, especially writing and art. I live and breathe #webperf and constantly improve the web products and people around me with what I learn. I believe that code is craft, and I passionately advocate for the user’s experience. Find me on the interwebs: aboutme Twitter: Personal Twitter: AI Projects TikTok: AI Projects YouTube: AI Projects LinkedIn Slides.
